fields.title: Consent
fields.description: Processing of personal data based on consent of data principal.

fields.title: Obligations of Data Fiduciary
fields.description: General obligations of data fiduciary including data protection measures.

fields.title: Children's Personal Data
fields.description: Additional obligations for processing children's personal data.

fields.title: Rights of Data Principal
fields.description: Rights of data principals including access and correction.

fields.name: Data Collection & Consent
fields.description: Compliance requirements related to lawful collection of personal data and obtaining valid consent.

fields.name: Data Fiduciary Obligations
fields.description: Compliance with obligations of data fiduciaries under DPDP Act.

fields.name: Children's Data Protection
fields.description: Special requirements for processing personal data of children.

fields.name: Data Principal Rights
fields.description: Implementation of data principal rights under DPDP Act.

fields.title: Consent Notice Provided
fields.description: Verify that a clear and specific consent notice is provided to data principals before collecting personal data.
fields.guidance: Check if the application displays a consent notice that clearly explains what data is collected and why.
fields.evidence_required: Screenshots of consent forms, consent notice documents

fields.title: Consent is Free and Affirmative
fields.description: Verify that consent is obtained through a free and affirmative action by the data principal.
fields.guidance: Ensure consent is not bundled, pre-ticked, or obtained through deceptive practices.
fields.evidence_required: UI screenshots showing consent mechanism, user flow documentation

fields.title: Purpose Limitation
fields.description: Personal data is collected only for specified, lawful purposes disclosed to the data principal.
fields.guidance: Review privacy policy and data collection points to verify purpose limitation compliance.

fields.title: Data Security Measures
fields.description: Reasonable security safeguards are implemented to prevent data breaches.
fields.guidance: Review security measures including encryption, access controls, and security policies.
fields.evidence_required: Security policy documents, encryption certificates, access control logs

fields.title: Data Breach Notification
fields.description: Procedures exist to notify Data Protection Board and affected individuals in case of breach.
fields.guidance: Verify breach notification procedures and timelines are documented.
fields.evidence_required: Incident response plan, breach notification templates

fields.title: Data Retention Policy
fields.description: Personal data is not retained longer than necessary for the purpose.
fields.guidance: Review data retention policies and verify implementation.
fields.evidence_required: Data retention policy, data lifecycle documentation

fields.title: Verifiable Parental Consent
fields.description: For children's data, verifiable consent from parent/guardian is obtained.
fields.guidance: Check age verification mechanisms and parental consent workflows.
fields.evidence_required: Age verification UI, parental consent forms

fields.title: No Behavioral Tracking of Children
fields.description: No tracking or behavioral monitoring of children is performed.
fields.guidance: Verify analytics and tracking mechanisms exclude children's data.

fields.title: Right to Access
fields.description: Data principals can access their personal data and processing information.
fields.guidance: Verify data access request mechanism is available and functional.
fields.evidence_required: Data access request form, response templates

fields.title: Right to Correction
fields.description: Data principals can correct or complete their personal data.
fields.guidance: Check if data correction mechanism is available in the application.
fields.evidence_required: Profile edit functionality, data correction request process

fields.title: Right to Erasure
fields.description: Data principals can request erasure of their personal data.
fields.guidance: Verify data deletion mechanism complies with retention requirements.
fields.evidence_required: Account deletion flow, data erasure request process

fields.title: Grievance Redressal
fields.description: A mechanism for grievance redressal is available to data principals.
fields.guidance: Check for grievance redressal officer appointment and contact details.
fields.evidence_required: Grievance policy, contact information, response SLAs
